testimonial.description: Great colleague. I learned a lot with regards to web flow and design from him.
If you are looking for someone who is automatic with their work ethic and getting things done, Manny is your guy.
The only thing I will say is that his work speaks for him. He is willing to spend sleepless nights just to get things done.
